previousProjects.name: Compute shader Raytracer
previousProjects.description: A compute shader raytracer based on the raytracer from the 'Raytracing in one weekend' series by Peter Shirley

previousProjects.name: Rubik Cube Solver
previousProjects.description: A Rubik cube visualiser and solver capable of solving both a 2x2 and 3x3 cube based on the beginner's method

previousProjects.name: LED Controller
previousProjects.description: A controller for an LED matrix using WLED for control, allowing for different effects and colour palettes to be selected and created

previousProjects.name: Concat
previousProjects.description: A Reverse Polish Notation (RPN) based scripting language

previousProjects.name: OCaml Ray Tracer
previousProjects.description: A raytracer written in OCaml, outputting to a PPM file. Capable of loading OBJ files

previousProjects.name: OCaml LR Parser / Lexer
previousProjects.description: A basic Parser/Lexer that takes an LR grammar and generates a parse tree for an expression

previousProjects.name: LR Table Generator
previousProjects.description: An Ocaml program that takes a grammar and returns the goto and action tables for the language
